"The Power of Now" by Eckhart Tolle: This song would remind me to live in the present moment and not get caught up in jealousy or negative thoughts.
"I Will Survive" by Gloria Gaynor: This song would remind me to overcome any obstacles or setbacks I may face and keep moving forward.
"Hallelujah" by Leonard Cohen: This song would remind me to appreciate the beauty and joy in life, even in the midst of challenges.
"Roar" by Katy Perry: This song would remind me to be confident and strong, and not let anyone hold me back.
"Eye of the Tiger" by Survivor: This song would remind me to stay focused and determined, and never give up on my goals.
